titles.title: Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Nashua, Squannacook, and Nissitissit Rivers as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Nashua River Wild and Scenic River Act of 2018
This bill designates specified segments of the Nashua, Squannacook, and Nissitissit rivers in Massachusetts and New Hampshire as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System. The bill excludes from such designation certain areas with respect to the Ice House and Pepperell hydroelectric projects and the Hollingsworth and Vose dam.
